Alteration 4

Curse of Stones
Combat
E3
spell id [id]: 637
effect number [effect_number]: 11
damage [damage]: 32
spec [spec]: 25427968
casting time [casttime]: 200%
area of effect [aoe_s]: 100% of battlefield
number of effects [nreff]: 1
fatigue cost [fatiguecost]: 300-
gems required [gemcost]: 3E
Cause Affliction: Rapidly Fatigue
Will not be cast against small numbers of enemies:1
 
(Affects Enemies Only [friendlyimmune], May Use Underwater [uwok], Magic Resistance Negates Easily [mrnegateseasily])
The caster curses the enemy army with the weight of earth and stones. Affected enemy units are severely burdened and moving will be slow and exhausting. Attack speed will not be affected, but fighting will be extra exhausting and can prove disastrous even for lightly armed soldiers. The curse will last until the battle is over.
Combat speed reduced by -25%, causes d4 fatigue per square moved, encumbrance increased by +3.
